reporter_caption.center: COMMONWEALTH, DEPT. OF HIGHWAYS v. HALL, 516 S.W.2d 112 (Ky. 1974)

caption.center: COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, DEPARTMENT OF HIGHWAYS, Appellant, v. Harry R.
HALL and Bernice E. Hall, wife, Appellees.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Jefferson Circuit Court, Common Pleas Branch, 4th Division; George B. Ryan, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Jim Robinson, Dept.of Highways, Frankfort, William W. Lawrence, Louisville, for appellant.
Bernard B. Davis and John E. Boyce, Louisville, for appellees.
opinion.opinion_text:
Memorandum Opinion PER CURIAM, Affirming.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.
